Perhaps Head Trip? The Slice of Life webcomic that documents the antics of redhead nerdette Malory and friends, as well as family.

Don't know Head Trip? Check it out!

155332222222222222.title: Head Trip

1553322222222222221.content:
Let's get acquainted with the limited awesome cast, shall we?

Malory (abbreviated 'Mal')
--------

The snarky redhead, and central protagonist of this comic! A nerd of the pleasant kind, has a tendency to take violent measures against unanimously-loathed targets ('Twilight' fans being her most notorious take), much to the annoyance of the Devil, who will often berate her for actions - before he supports her, anyway.


Kathryn (abbreviated 'Kat')
--------
Malory's levelheaded younger sibling, tends to have an odd, sometimes even spacey sense of humor, but is good-natured to those around her. In recent times, she has made the step to motherhood with her husband, Michael.


Lilian
--------
Younger sibling to Malory and Kat, managed to survive the grueling world of High School with her intelligence and dry humor, as well as a beating to those unfortunate to get on her bad side. She is presumed to currently be in college.

More cast bios coming soon...
1553322222222222221.title: Redhead Nerdettes? Count me in!

155332222222222222222222222222221.title: Questionable Content

info.brief_description: characters from your favorite online comics get bigger and sexier.
info.description: This is an expansion story dedicated to the many web comics that populate the Internet. My standards aren't terribly high so I most likely won't edit or remove a chapter if I do I will contact you with an e-mail explaining my decision. One thing I will not tolerate within the story is rape any chapters containing rape will be removed. Other than that you're free to do just about anything you want and I encourage you to add your own favorite web comics to the selection.
